suite.name: Amazonteste

test.name: Caso de teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Eletrônicos"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (133.0.6943.126) detected in PATH at C:\WINDOWS\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (134.0.6998.88); currently, chromedriver 134.0.6998.88 is recommended for chrome 134.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Eletrônicos e Tecnologia"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

test.doc: Esse teste verifica o menu eletronico do site da Amazon.com.br e verifica a categoria Computadores e Informática

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da Amazon.com.br

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (133.0.6943.126) detected in PATH at C:\WINDOWS\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (134.0.6998.88); currently, chromedriver 134.0.6998.88 is recommended for chrome 134.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
